<title level="1" right="Rules">[Condition](/Rules.aspx?ID=3294)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An ongoing effect that changes how a character can act, or that alters some of their statistics, is called a condition. The rules for the basic conditions used in the game can be found in the [Conditions Appendix](/Rules.aspx?ID=2455) at the back of this book.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
